Yeah, word "compatible" there means "make playable on more devices" not "less". Hall Pass 352p is not iPod/nokia compatible, but both Red Riding Hood and Hall Pass 352p are playable on PC/Mac platforms, especially if they're on normal CRT monitors and no-flat-screen TV sets.
